Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Eumenine mastoparan-OD (EMP-OD; Venom peptide 1, OdVP1; Insects, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the MCD family (Mastoparan subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19857508]Fungi:Candida albicans, Botrytis cinerea (++);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli;Gram-positive bacterium:S. aureus (+)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.18695936]42% hemolytic activity at 50 Î¼M against sheep blood cells
Sequence Information.Binding Target: Cell membrane (Note: Assumes an amphipathic alpha-helical conformation in a lipid environmen
Sequence Information.Function: Has hemolytic activity against ovine erythrocytes at micromolar concentrations. Also exhibits strong antimicrobial activity.

Literature.Title: Isolation and molecular cloning of venom peptides from Orancistrocerus drewseni (Hymenoptera Eumenidae).
Literature.Author: Baek JH, Lee SH.

Literature.Title: Novel mastoparan and protonectin analogs isolated from a solitary wasp, Orancistrocerus drewseni drewseni.
Literature.Author: Murata K, Shinada T, Ohfune Y, Hisada M, Yasuda A, Naoki H, Nakajima T.
